headline.main: AMERICANS, BRITISH RAID ENEMY IN BURMA; Shipping, Barracks, Warehouses and Railway Main Targets

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, Aug. 1 (AP) -- American Mitchell bombers attacked shipping on the Irrawaddy River in northeastern Burma yesterday, scoring hits on two river boats and a big barge. They also attacked Japanese barracks and storage warehouses near Bhamo, leaving them in flames.
abstract: US planes raid Irrawaddy River shipping, Bhamo and Nyaungbinwun; RAF raids Myingyan ry yds, Ye-U, Kinbin area and Buthidaung
